original_text: As soon as he had finished speaking, he threw away the jawbone out of his hand. And that place was called Ramath-lehi.
korean_text: 그가 말을 마치고 턱뼈를 자기 손에서 내던지고 그 곳을 라맛 레히라 이름하였더라

sentences.original_text: As soon as he had finished speaking,
he threw away the jawbone out of his hand.
And that place was called Ramath-lehi.
